article_title: Brazil bets big on telehealth in fight against Zika
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Faced with insufficient infrastructure and geographical barriers to healthcare access, many providers in Brazil are turning to telehealth to confront the threat of Zika, according to NPR.

og.description: Faced with insufficient infrastructure and geographical barriers to healthcare access, many providers in Brazil are turning to telehealth to confront the threat of Zika, according to NPR.
